alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 22 at 3:52PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Yukon River at Stevens Village. * WHEN...Until 1000 PM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of low lying area is occurring. Some roads are inundated with water, including over a foot of water over the airport access road. Homes and other structures in lower parts of the village may have water surround or flood them. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 300 PM AKDT, Rapid snowmelt in the Eastern Brooks Range continues to send a large volume of water down tributaries feeding the Yukon and Porcupine River. This high water will continue to move down the Yukon River over the next several days. Stevens Village is seeing higher water than observed during breakup. - Expect river levels to continue a slow rise and crest over the next day or two. Even after water levels begin fall, they will remain high into next week. - http://weather.gov/aprfc
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
